channel.title: Comments on: It’s Tuesday, get pushing Pix.ie

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: Marcus is working on a plugin so we can replace the Flickr photos with Pix.ie ones.
item.content:encoded: Marcus is working on a plugin so we can replace the Flickr photos with Pix.ie ones.

item.title: By: Maryrose Lyons
item.dc:creator: Maryrose Lyons
item.description: In honour of Pixie Tuesday can i suggest you update your flickr pics on the right? Some of those events are close to a year old...or better, add a pixie feed.
item.content:encoded: In honour of Pixie Tuesday can i suggest you update your flickr pics on the right? Some of those events are close to a year old…or better, add a pixie feed.

item.title: By: Robin Blandford [ ByteSurgery.com - Digital Media Engineering ] » Blog Archive » Pushing Ireland by Pushing Pix.ie
item.dc:creator: Robin Blandford [ ByteSurgery.com - Digital Media Engineering ] » Blog Archive » Pushing Ireland by Pushing Pix.ie
item.description: [...] As a non-user, I feel unqualified to commentate on it, anyway, there’s been lots of rave reviews from people I trust - so Pix.ie must have [...]
item.content:encoded: [...] As a non-user, I feel unqualified to commentate on it, anyway, there’s been lots of rave reviews from people I trust – so Pix.ie must have [...]

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: Awesome, I've been meaning to ask you about that.
item.content:encoded: Awesome, I’ve been meaning to ask you about that.

item.title: By: Marcus Mac Innes
item.dc:creator: Marcus Mac Innes
item.description: Thanks Conor! We haven't forgotten about the Pixie Wordpress plugin we promised you for web2ireland. We'll have it over to you shortly!
item.content:encoded: Thanks Conor! We haven’t forgotten about the Pixie WordPress plugin we promised you for web2ireland. We’ll have it over to you shortly!
